description: This file defines a React functional component named CaptureScreen that provides a user interface for capturing a link, optionally generating a title and summary using AI, and saving the information via external API calls. It manages user input, state, and interactions related to link capture within a React Native app.

methods.name: fetchTitle
methods.description: Fetches the webpage at the given URL and extracts its title using a regular expression.

methods.name: onPasteUrl
methods.description: Handles the event when a user pastes a URL, updates the state, and fetches the webpage title.

methods.name: onGenerateSummary
methods.description: Calls an external AI utility to generate a summary for the provided URL, updates the summary state.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Validates input, detects source, constructs payload, and saves the link and metadata through an API call.
